title: The New client is being really buggy! (NEED HELP!)
body:
>1.) Everything runs fine until you try to start a game in the lobby it will say game found and when i click accept it just stays there and then when the timer runs out to choose a character it pops up the leave buster happens with ranked and regular draft as well.
>2.) If that's not the problem everything will run smoothly until when you go to lock in a character after click the lock button it just stalls there and then the time will run out and either locks in or kicks you out and gives you a leave buster!
>3.)After a game is complete and goes back to the client win or lose i have had a couple of games not give me any IP and it says that it has but in the end game results but doesn't get added to my IP!
>4)Also after finishing a game and going to start a new one it shows previously lobby lock ins and characters and previous players and wont refresh and then sends you back out to the lobby and says failed to lock in the champion and gives a leave buster!

Those are some of the major problems and i gotten leave busters because of these. I have already un/reinstalled the client and patched it a couple of times but still the same problems or new ones appear........

some of the minors ones that happens sometimes,
>unable to change spells 
>unable to change skins both character and wards
>unable to change and or change masteries  but not displayed correctly and or wipes them clean
 
only in character selection this happens.
A help / fix and or reply would be helpful on what to do.
i love the new client its really great clean sleek and easy to navigate.

replies.body:
A lot of the issues you described are typically caused by a really poor connection to our servers. I'd recommend working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure your local settings are compatible with League before we investigate further into this.

Let me know if those steps caused any change.

A lot of people are having issues with the new client being laggy, and it doesn't seem to be related to internet connection. I had to revert to the old client due to how laggy it was (and I'm on a brand new, top of the line computer, and I'm very close to the server, never have connection problems to games etc). The lag he's talking about in champ select can be particularly bad.

It is definitely not the internet connection, because I tried to use my really good 100/100 wifi which was expensive and still it doesn't work. I tried to play multiple games, but I try to start a game and instantly a lag spike in the client.{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
